Source.Name: foremost
Source.Summary: Foremost is a Linux program to recover files based on their headers and footers.
Source.Description: Foremost is a Linux program to recover files based on their headers and footers. Foremost can work on image files, such as those generated by dd, Safeback, Encase, etc, or directly on a drive. The headers and footers are specified by a configuration file, so you can pick and choose which headers you want to look for.
